property.description: Background color

property.description: Text font

property.description: The border that is drawn around text fields.

property.description: The top side border for text fields.

property.description: The right side border for text fields.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for text fields.

property.description: The left side border for text fields.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for text widget.

property.description: Background image position for text fields.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for text fields.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for single-line text fields. Also used for spinner.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: Inner or outer shadow around the bounds of a Text widget.

style.name: MULTI

state.name: read-only

property.name: color
property.description: Text message color

property.description: Shadow for message text.

element.description: The single Text field search icon.

property.description: The image for the search icon.

element.name: Text-Cancel-Icon
element.description: The single Text field cancel icon.

property.description: The image for the cancel icon.
